about_the_game:
Nightmare Of SilkenCore - Train Hell

Dive into a thrilling adventure where danger lurks around every corner. You play as a daring journalist and hunter of mysteries, called to a remote island to investigate a terrifying anomaly. What starts as a simple job quickly turns into a fight for survival.

Your mission? Retrieve four mysterious artifacts scattered across the island to uncover the secrets of this cursed place. To get around, you'll rely on a unique vehicle: an improbable mix between a shopping cart and a makeshift car. But be vigilant, for the island is home to far more than one danger…

Blinky, a living, malevolent train, prowls in the shadows, ready to hunt you down. And he’s not alone. Other terrifying creatures inhabit this land. Will you survive their relentless attacks and complete your mission?

Features:

  • Open-world exploration: Traverse a vast island filled with dangers and mysteries.

  • Resource management and survival: Repair and upgrade your vehicle while avoiding the threats that stalk you.

  • Face your fears: Encounter terrifying creatures, each with its own unique way of hunting you.

  • Unravel the mystery: Use your journalistic instincts to uncover the dark secrets of the island and Blinky.

Get ready for an adventure where every decision could be your last. Can you solve the mystery and survive Blinky’s island?
